name: Guardian Knight
description:
Takes about 10 Seconds to Load.

First game I ever made, Developed 100% using the scratch visual language.

I has been converted to HTML so there maybe a few odd visual artifacts (title screen)

Princess Bella has been captured and its your job to rescue her from the evil Litch Lord. Only grit and your sword will bring victory.

15 Challenging Levels over 3 world maps.

8 Different Enemies

3 boss fights with unique mechanics

Multiple endings

Includes body count survival mode.
